mapper.select: select distinct com_dept_num, com_dept_name from members where com_num=#{com_num} order by com_dept_num
select distinct com_pos_num, com_pos_name from members where com_num=#{com_num} order by com_pos_num

select s.salary_num,s.mem_num,m.name,s.com_num,m.com_name,m.com_dept_num,m.com_dept_name,m.com_pos_num,m.com_pos_name,s.salary_year,s.salary_add_time,s.salary_add_holiday,s.salary_bonus,s.costs_food,s.costs_transport,s.costs_benefit from salary s inner join members m on s.mem_num = m.mem_num where s.com_num=#{com_num} and m.com_dept_num=#{dept_num} order by m.com_pos_num

select s.salary_num,s.mem_num,m.name,s.com_num,m.com_name,m.com_dept_num,m.com_dept_name,m.com_pos_num,m.com_pos_name,s.salary_year,s.salary_add_time,s.salary_add_holiday,s.salary_bonus,s.costs_food,s.costs_transport,s.costs_benefit from salary s inner join members m on s.mem_num = m.mem_num where s.com_num=#{com_num} and m.com_pos_num=#{pos_num} order by m.com_dept_num

select s.salary_num,s.mem_num,m.name,s.com_num,m.com_name,m.com_dept_num,m.com_dept_name,m.com_pos_num,m.com_pos_name,s.salary_year,s.salary_add_time,s.salary_add_holiday,s.salary_bonus,s.costs_food,s.costs_transport,s.costs_benefit from salary s inner join members m on s.mem_num = m.mem_num where s.com_num=#{com_num} order by m.com_dept_num, m.com_pos_num

select s.salary_num,s.mem_num,m.name,s.com_num,m.com_name,m.com_dept_num,m.com_dept_name,m.com_pos_num,m.com_pos_name,s.salary_year,s.salary_add_time,s.salary_add_holiday,s.salary_bonus,s.costs_food,s.costs_transport,s.costs_benefit from salary s inner join members m on s.mem_num = m.mem_num where s.mem_num=#{mem_num}
